channel.title: Community on Eclipse Hono
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Eclipse Hono

item.title: Contributing
item.description: Thank you for considering to contribute to Eclipse Hono™. We really appreciate the time and effort you want to spend helping to improve things around here. And help we can use :-)

item.title: Presentations
item.description: On this page you can find links to arbitrary material covering Eclipse Hono which has been presented at events, conferences and meet-ups or are available online.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Wanna tell us what you think about Eclipse Hono™? What we can improve? Which feature is missing? Or just discuss architectural issues?

item.title: Road Map
item.description: We are trying our best to anticipate the needs and requirements of users based on the feedback we get from users. From this information we maintain a Road Map for the next several releases.
